summary: Bug fix verification PASSED for NodeToolbar touch/click support. The fix using position: fixed, onClick + onTouchEnd with debounce (lastClickTime ref), and z-[9999] is working correctly on both Desktop and Mobile viewports. All toolbar buttons execute their actions and console logs confirm '[NodeToolbar] Button clicked:' messages.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: Uses position: fixed to escape touch-none container - CORRECT
✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: ToolbarButton uses onClick + onTouchEnd with lastClickTime ref debounce (300ms) - CORRECT
✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: z-[9999] ensures toolbar is above all other elements - CORRECT
✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: Buttons have min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] for proper touch hit area - CORRECT
✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: Has touch-manipulation, WebkitTapHighlightColor: transparent - CORRECT
✅ MultiSelectToolbar.jsx: Same pattern with position: fixed, z-[9999] - CORRECT
✅ ContextMenu.jsx: Same pattern with z-index: 99999 - CORRECT

context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug fix for NodeToolbar verified on both Desktop (1920x1080) and Mobile (390x844). The fix uses: 1) position: fixed to escape touch-none container, 2) onClick + onTouchEnd with lastClickTime ref debounce (300ms) to prevent double firing, 3) z-[9999] for high stacking. All toolbar buttons (Edit, Duplicate, Delete, Alignment, '+') work correctly. Console logs confirm '[NodeToolbar] Button clicked:' messages. Test user: testuser123/password123.
